challenges.description:
As an Azure engineer, my job has been to manage, deploy and optimize Microsoft Azure cloud solutions for enterprise infrastructure and applications. To do this, I have used my knowledge of cloud computing, Azure services, scripting and programming, DevOps and security and compliance. Some of the tasks I performed have been:

- Configure and manage Azure cloud environments, including virtual networks, virtual machines, containers, storage, backup and disaster recovery.
- Implement and monitor Azure solutions to improve performance, availability, scalability and efficiency of cloud resources.
- Automate and orchestrate cloud processes using tools such as PowerShell, Azure CLI, Azure DevOps and Azure Resource Manager.
- Develop and implement security and compliance policies and procedures to protect data and resources in the cloud.
- Create Docker containers to support deprecated SSOOs that cannot be deployed in Azure.

We are building a payment gateway.
I want to focus on the technology we use daily: Scrum, Kanban, Stripe, Python, Jenkins, Docker, SQLServer, and Azure mainly.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
Mis roles ideales ser√≠an trabajo remoto como Project manager/Scrum master, desarrollador o DevOp.

Me encanta abordar nuevos desaf√≠os. Me enorgullezco de contribuir al software libre (GitHub reconoce mi labor y me regala cada mes la suscripci√≥n a Copilot).

Me he llevado tres a√±os levantando un proyecto sobre pasarelas de pago dirigiendo un equipo de seis personas, pero me apasiona desarrollar.

Ahora busco algo remoto y estable, ya que me he llevado toda mi vida siendo freelance (no me ha ido mal).
